original_text: And the Lord commanded me at that time to teach you statutes and rules, that you might do them in the land that you are going over to possess.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 내게 명령하사 너희에게 규례와 법도를 교훈하게 하셨나니 이는 너희가 거기로 건너가 받을 땅에서 행하게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord commanded me at that time
to teach you statutes and rules
that you are going over to possess
